mcq.statement: In which year did some prominent Hindus of Banaras start a movement for the replacement of Urdu by Hindi as the court language in North Western Provinces?
mcq.one_liner: The movement to replace Urdu with Hindi as the court language in North Western Provinces was initiated by some prominent Hindus of Banaras in **1867**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
